roleset.name: make complicated

role.descr: agent, entity causing something to become complicated

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: It 's complicated , I 'll grant you that .

example.name: All args
example.text: The position is complicated for me by the fact that I really began to write novels, not out of any spiritual urgency, but in order to earn money.
example.arg: by the fact that I really began to write novels, not out of any spiritual urgency, but in order to earn money.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.
